name: 勞維俊
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week	Topic
1	Introduction
2	How to get your foot in the door, p. 73
3	
4	Fear and fakes, p. 83	
5		
6	What if…?	
7		
8	Mid-term Examiantion
9	Campus Wide Mid-term Exam
10	The tragedy of the tiger, p. 105	
11		
12	Big brothers is getting bigger, p. 117	
13		
14	Words of love, p. 127	
15		
16	Review
17	Final Examination
18	Campus Wide Final Exam
